thread.title: BRIEF-Invesco Ltd. Announces February 28, 2018 Assets Under Management

title: BRIEF-Invesco Ltd. Announces February 28, 2018 Assets Under Management
text: March 12, 2018 / 8:31 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Invesco Ltd. Announces February 28, 2018 Assets Under Management Reuters Staff March 12 (Reuters) - Invesco Ltd: * INVESCO LTD. ANNOUNCES FEBRUARY 28, 2018 ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT * INVESCO LTD - ‍PRELIMINARY AVERAGE TOTAL AUM FOR QUARTER THROUGH FEBRUARY 28 WERE $954.4 BILLION​ * INVESCO - PRELIMINARY MONTH-END ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT (AUM) OF $945.4 BILLION, A DECREASE OF 2.8% MONTH OVER MONTH * INVESCO LTD - ‍PRELIMINARY AVERAGE ACTIVE AUM FOR QUARTER THROUGH FEBRUARY 28 WERE $750.4 BILLION​ * INVESCO LTD - ‍ PRELIMINARY FEBRUARY MONTH-END ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT (AUM) OF $945.4 BILLION, A DECREASE OF 2.8% MONTH OVER MONTH​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
